message.content:
{"id": "19933", "title": "Emacs: keybinding service always clears status line", 
"description": "When running in with Emacs keybindings, any action that writes to the statusline will have the status line message cleared by AcceleratorScope.resetMode. However, the action could have written to the status line. We currently do not have the API necessary to get the message in the status line, so it is not possible to solve the problem in general. The problem can be solved for some cases by not clearing the status line when running in the default mode.", 
"OB": "When running in with Emacs keybindings, any action that writes to the status line is expected to display the message in the status line. However, the current implementation clears the status line when using AcceleratorScope.resetMode, causing the message to be removed.", 
"EB": "When running in with Emacs keybindings, any action that writes to the status line should continue to display the message as intended. The status line should not be cleared when using AcceleratorScope.resetMode.", 
"SR": "Modify the AcceleratorScope.resetMode function to keep the status line message intact when running in the default mode with Emacs keybindings."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '19933', 'title': 'Bug 19933Emacs: keybinding service always clears status line', 'description': 'Bug 19933Emacs: keybinding service always clears status line However, the action could havewritten to the status line.We currently do not have the API necessary to get the message in the statusline, so it is not possible to solve the problem in general. The problem can besolved for some cases by not clearing the status line when running in thedefault mode. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Build 20020611When running in with Emacs keybindings, any action that writes to the statusline will have the status line message cleared by AcceleratorScope.resetMode.When a mode is entered, the keysequence that started the mode is written to thestatus line. '}
